features.featureTitle: In the Bluetooth connection request (within BluetoothContext.tsx and/or useEyeRBluetooth.ts), update the navigator.bluetooth.requestDevice() call to use 'acceptAllDevices: true' instead of any device filters, and add the device's NUS service UUID '6e400001-b5a3-f393-e0a9-e50e24dcca9e' to the 'optionalServices' array so the browser grants access to that GATT service after pairing.
